title: National Committee of the Chinese Financial, Commercial, Light Industry, Textile and Tobacco Workers' Union
text: The National Committee of the Chinese Financial, Commercial, Light Industry, Textile and Tobacco Workers’ Union is a national industrial <a href="trade%20union">union</a> of the <a href="All-China%20Federation%20of%20Trade%20Unions">All-China Federation of Trade Unions</a> in the <a href="People%27s%20Republic%20of%20China">People's Republic of China</a>.
